intro.title:
Science
is powerful
intro.body: In a changing world, we need to come together to celebrate the power of international collaboration. Add your voice to the movement to keep science open.

signup.title: Take action! Be part of the movement
signup.footer: We'll send you well-timed news and ideas for how you can support the movement. We won't share your email with anyone else.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body:
Together Science Can celebrates the power of international collaboration. Today there are problems seemingly too big and too complex to solve. In these cases, there is only one thing researchers can do - stand together.

Together we mix backgrounds, logic and instinct. Together we push the boundaries of what is possible. Together we do more than we do apart.

Together science can keep borders open to collaboration and progress.
